name: JaegusFirstTalk
_source: s;Jaegus;Welcome, welcome. Have a look or take a seat.{w}{br}Food and drink is a few gold, weapons are a bit more.
s;Jaegus;I recognize you.{w} Young Lord Verstadt!
s;Simon;I am he. Though few know me as a lord now.
s;Jaegus;A shame. I was hoping you could turn your house around-{w}{br}not to speak ill of your da, but...{c:wait;1000} you know.
s;Simon;Do you work for the temple?
s;Jaegus;With them, never for them.{w} It's a good deal we've both got.{w}{br}The people who stop to buy stop to pray,{w}{br}and the people who stop to pray stop to buy.
s;Simon;I see.{w} But you don't worship Clotho?
s;Jaegus;I'm a merchant! A god's nothing more than a way to lose money.
s;Simon;I suppose you don't have much of a soul for them to take mercy on.
s;Jaegus;I see you've got a tongue on you.{w}{br}I'm getting impatient.
